title: Beautiful Sunday
lyrics: Intro: Sunday morning up with the lark Hey, hey hey, it’s a beautiful day I’ve got someone waiting for me Hey, hey hey, it’s a beautiful day Hi, hi, hi, beautiful Sun day This is my, my, my beautiful day Said that you love me Oh, my, my, my its a beautiful day. Birds are singing, you’re by my side Hey, hey, hey, it’s a beautiful day. We’ll drive on and follow the sun Hey, hey, hey its a beautiful day Hi, hi, hi, beautiful Sun day This is my, my, my beautiful day Said that you love me Oh, my, my, my its a beautiful day.
